function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor mental and emotional health due to lack of access to natural light and green views","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interaction between smart and non-smart workers in relation to psychological health outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of home confinement on psychological health outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent results in literature regarding the association between indoor plants and anxiety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association between green view and psychological health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitivity analysis on covid-19 cases and green features","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect modification by the current working mode","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of covid-19 pandemic among respondents.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of psychological health outcomes such as anxiety, irritability, and sleep disturbance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to outdoor green features and natural light.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The presence of confirmed covid-19 cases per regional population as a potential confounding variable in the analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The high number of positive covid-19 cases in certain regions in relation to the total population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The division of participants into smart workers and non-smart workers based on their current working mode cwm .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Single-exposure regression analysis used to estimate associations between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inclusion of covariates such as age, gender, education level, working mode, income decrease, presence of other people, and presence of pets in the regression models.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of beta coefficients as a quantitative measure of the associations between green-related variables and psychological outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported increase in levels of anxiety, anger, fear, and other negative emotions during quarantine.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validated scales assessing perceived change in psychological indicators during quarantine.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential detrimental effect of quarantine on psychological health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects on mental health due to the covid-19 pandemic lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with data protection laws and ethical standards","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of indoor plants correlated with positive emotions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonprobability sampling technique snowball sampling","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to natural spaces due to mobility restrictions affecting vulnerable individuals’ psychological health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preventing outdoor activities for children during home confinement leading to physical and psychological disorders","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Banned access to public green spaces affecting the physical and psychological well-being of the interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term quarantine leading to detrimental effects on psychological health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased activities in public and open spaces during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Depiction of climate change as a perpetual pandemic may trivialize the severity of actual pandemics and their impact on public health and safety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize climate policy in the wake of the pandemic may result in missed opportunities to address long-term environmental and societal challenges.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in response to building evidence of crisis mitigation measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of new therapeutics and vaccines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation from untrusted sources","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to protect vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential negative impacts of social responses to the pandemic on contagious disease propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in the interpretation of the christmas effect and coronavirus effect in altering routines and practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate financing of social responses leading to a lack of capacity to manage emergency measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic has showcased that academics and those in higher education can quickly and creatively change how they deliver lectures and are accessible to students.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic has revealed complex and shifting contours of how the disease is shaping global patterns of energy consumption, policymaking, and governance.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic is altering the desirability of some emerging innovations and sustainability transitions, and heightening coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting surveys in a global epicenter of the disease new york","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for future energy studies to overlook the impact of social-psychological factors on technology adoption and well-being during
